price: 56. Tu[387] ne sauras guider qui tu aimes, mais Allah guide qui Il veut. Il est le Meilleur à reconnaître ceux qui sont guidés vers la bonne direction.
arabic: إِنَّكَ لَا تَهۡدِي مَنۡ أَحۡبَبۡتَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ
footnotes: [387] Muhammad (paix et bénédiction d’Allah sur lui).

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innaka lā tahdī man aḥbabta walākinna al-laha yahdī man yashāu wahuwa aʿlamu bil-muh'tadīna
